attributes.action: Make an enquiry into why the BBC is bias, and lying about the brexit aftermath
attributes.background: The BBC seem to be hell bent on lying to the public about the problems faced after brexit.  They are using the media as a political tool, to persuade a second referendum against the will of the people.  We should not have to pay the  BBC a licence fee if they cannot have a fair view

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC Trust is responsible for investigating breaches of the BBC Charter, which includes complaints about the impartiality of the BBC.

You can get in touch with the BBC Trust using the following website:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_us
